body.p:
Casey's Creek
Adair Co. Ky.
August 4th. 1865
His Excelency Thomas E. Bramlett
Governor of the Comonwealth of Kentucky
Frankfort Ky

Dear Sir -- I would humbly Recommend to your Mercy Milton B. Cox hewho has been Sentenced to the State Prison of Kentucky for the term of five Years. From the ^best^ and most reliable information that i have relative to his trial it is apparent that there existed prejudices agan against him. which deprived him of Justice -- See the accompnying petition -- Milton B. Cox is a Young man who I believe was generally regarded as a worthy
Youth, until he was charged with the robbery for which he was convicted
